title: State Police investigate accidental shooting involving teen in Windham
content:
WINDHAM– State Police are investigating what they say appears to be an accidental shooting that happened Tuesday night.
Detectives responded around 10:15 p.m. to 64 Windham Center Rd. in Windham. State police said the investigation determined that the victim was a 17-year-old boy and the shooting was accidental and self inflicted. However, the shooting is still being investigated and the official cause hasn’t yet been determined.
The gunshot wound was to the head, and the victim, identified as Wesley Rodriguez, remains in critical condition.
